meta.title: BlackElephant | Technology and Innovation for your Business
meta.description: Websites, Systems, Apps and Automation with Artificial Intelligence. Transform your business with cutting-edge technology. Free consultation!
meta.keywords: web development, apps, systems, automation, artificial intelligence, digital transformation

home.title: Black Elephant
home.subtitle: Transforming ideas into reality
home.heroDescription: Have the solution for all your digital problems. Websites, systems, apps and AI automation for your company to take off in business.
home.portfolioDesc: Discover some of the projects we've developed. Each solution is unique, specially designed for each client's needs.
home.process1Desc: We deeply understand your business and needs
home.process1Details: We conduct a complete analysis of your business, understanding your needs, challenges and objectives. This stage is fundamental to create a solution that really makes a difference.
home.process2Desc: We create a detailed strategy and roadmap
home.process2Details: We create wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize the solution before development. You actively participate in design decisions.
home.process3Desc: We build with the best technologies
home.process3Details: We develop your project using the most modern technologies on the market, with weekly sprints and constant deliveries for you to follow.
home.process4Desc: We validate every detail before launch
home.process4Details: We train your team to use all the solution's features, ensuring everyone is prepared to extract maximum value.
home.process5Details: We offer continuous support and maintenance to ensure your solution continues working perfectly and evolving with your business.
home.ctaDescription: Get in touch and discover how we can help your company reach new heights. Free consultation!
home.servicesSubtitle: Complete solutions for your digital transformation
home.service1Desc: Modern websites and web applications with the best technologies on the market.
home.service2Desc: Native and hybrid apps for iOS and Android with exceptional experience.
home.service3Desc: AI and Machine Learning solutions to automate and optimize processes.
home.service4Desc: Strategy and technology planning to accelerate your growth.
home.aboutText: We are a technology company focused on creating solutions that make a difference. We combine technical expertise with strategic vision to deliver extraordinary results.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Meet BlackElephant
about.heroText: We are passionate about technology and innovation. Our mission is to transform ideas into digital solutions that positively impact businesses and people.
about.missionText: Deliver innovative technology solutions that drive our clients' success.
about.visionText: Be a reference in technological innovation, recognized for the excellence and impact of our solutions.
about.value1Desc: We constantly seek new ways to solve problems.
about.value2Desc: We deliver quality in every line of code.
about.value3Desc: Clear and honest communication in all relationships.
about.value4Desc: We work together to achieve extraordinary results.

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Complete solutions for your company
services.description: We offer a complete portfolio of technology services to meet all your business needs.

web.title: Web Development
web.description: We create modern, fast, and secure websites and web applications using the most advanced technologies on the market.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: We develop native and hybrid applications for iOS and Android focused on usability and performance.

ai.title: Artificial Intelligence
ai.description: We implement AI and Machine Learning solutions to automate processes and generate valuable insights.

consulting.title: Tech Consulting
consulting.description: We offer strategic consulting to help your company make the best technology decisions.

cloud.title: Cloud & DevOps
cloud.description: We architect and manage scalable and secure cloud infrastructures.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: We create elegant interfaces and memorable user experiences.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Let's talk
contact.description: We're ready to hear about your project. Get in touch and let's turn your ideas into reality.

contactForm.title: Send Message
contactForm.subtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you soon.

consultationForm.title: Free Consultation
consultationForm.subtitle: Schedule your free 1-hour consultation with us now. We'll understand your company's needs and propose solutions that will take you to the next level.
consultationForm.description: Briefly tell us about your project
consultationForm.descriptionPlaceholder: E.g.: I need a system to manage my online store...

footer.description: Transforming businesses through technology and innovation.
